SEARCH
Package HwSystem

Class HwSystem

java.lang.Object
HwSystem.HwSystem
public class HwSystem extends Object
The main hardware system class that manages all devices, protocols, and ports.

This class provides functionality to add, remove, and control various hardware devices connected to different communication protocol ports. It maintains the state of all ports and devices in the system and provides methods to interact with them.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    HwSystem()
    Constructs a new hardware system with empty device and port lists.

  • Constructor Details

    • HwSystem

      public HwSystem()
      Constructs a new hardware system with empty device and port lists.

  • Method Details

    • closeProtocols

      public void closeProtocols()
      Closes all protocol ports in the system. This should be called when shutting down the system to ensure proper cleanup.

    • setPortIdOfDevices

      public void setPortIdOfDevices()
      Initializes the port ID mapping for all devices. Sets all port IDs to -1 (unassigned) initially.

    • setDevices

      public void setDevices()
      Initializes the devices list with null values. Prepares the list to hold device references.

    • setProtocol

      public void setProtocol(Protocol pro)
      Adds a new protocol port to the system.
      Parameters:
      pro - The Protocol implementation to add

    • setSensorsNumber

      public void setSensorsNumber(int sensorsNumber)
      Sets the number of sensor devices in the system and initializes their port ID list.
      Parameters:
      sensorsNumber - The number of sensor devices

    • getSensorsNumber

      public int getSensorsNumber()
      Gets the number of sensor devices in the system.
      Returns:
      The number of sensor devices

    • setDisplaysNumber

      public void setDisplaysNumber(int displaysNumber)
      Sets the number of display devices in the system and initializes their port ID list.
      Parameters:
      displaysNumber - The number of display devices

    • getDisplaysNumber

      public int getDisplaysNumber()
      Gets the number of display devices in the system.
      Returns:
      The number of display devices

    • setWirelessIOsNumber

      public void setWirelessIOsNumber(int WirelessIOsNumber)
      Sets the number of wireless I/O devices in the system and initializes their port ID list.
      Parameters:
      WirelessIOsNumber - The number of wireless I/O devices

    • getWirelessIOsNumber

      public int getWirelessIOsNumber()
      Gets the number of wireless I/O devices in the system.
      Returns:
      The number of wireless I/O devices

    • setMotorDriversNumber

      public void setMotorDriversNumber(int motorDriversNumber)
      Sets the number of motor driver devices in the system and initializes their port ID list.
      Parameters:
      motorDriversNumber - The number of motor driver devices

    • getMotorDriversNumber

      public int getMotorDriversNumber()
      Gets the number of motor driver devices in the system.
      Returns:
      The number of motor driver devices

    • turnOn

      public void turnOn(int portId)
      Turns on a port and activates the device connected to it.
      Parameters:
      portId - The ID of the port to turn on

    • turnOff

      public void turnOff(int portId)
      Turns off a port and deactivates the device connected to it.
      Parameters:
      portId - The ID of the port to turn off

    • listPorts

      public void listPorts()
      Lists all ports in the system with their status and connected devices. Displays port ID, protocol type, occupancy status, and device details if occupied.

    • listDevType

      public void listDevType(String devType)
      Lists all devices of a specific type in the system. Displays device name, ID, port ID, and protocol for each matching device.
      Parameters:
      devType - The device type to list ("Display", "MotorDriver", "Sensor", or "WirelessIO")

    • readSensor

      public void readSensor(int devId)
      Reads data from a sensor device. Displays the sensor name, type, and current data if the device is active.
      Parameters:
      devId - The ID of the sensor device to read from

    • printDisplay

      public void printDisplay(int devId, String data)
      Prints data to a display device.
      Parameters:
      devId - The ID of the display device to print to
      data - The data string to display

    • readWireless

      public void readWireless(int devId)
      Reads data from a wireless I/O device.
      Parameters:
      devId - The ID of the wireless I/O device to read from

    • writeWireless

      public void writeWireless(int devId, String data)
      Writes data to a wireless I/O device.
      Parameters:
      devId - The ID of the wireless I/O device to write to
      data - The data string to send

    • setMotorSpeed

      public void setMotorSpeed(int devId, int speed)
      Sets the speed of a motor driver device.
      Parameters:
      devId - The ID of the motor driver device
      speed - The speed value to set

    • addDev

      public void addDev(String devName, int portId, int devId)
      Adds a new device to the system.
      Parameters:
      devName - The name/type of device to add
      portId - The port ID to connect the device to
      devId - The device ID to assign

    • rmDev

      public void rmDev(int portId)
      Removes a device from the specified port.
      Parameters:
      portId - The ID of the port from which to remove the device
